name: Captain Smash
description:
Captain Smash!

A platformer where you smash the ground to jump higher and destroy enemies.

Instructions:

Arrow keys(Left, Right)/A&D to move

Space to jump/smash

Official Build Version 1.0.0 - Release 20.09.2017

Version 0.9 -development build. 

Game design: @indieAlchemist

Music & SFX: @Coatedpolecat
